resource.name: Hamilton County E911 Active Calls
resource.description:
Please note that this data is no longer updated as E911 has updated the terms of service for their website as we are no longer able to scrape data from it. 

Hamilton county E911 active calls scraped from http://hamilton911.discoveregov.com/ 

Some records have been removed to be in compliance with TN Ann. Code §§ 37-1-409; 37-1-612 for the confidential of records of child abuse .

resource.name: Combined Community Survey Numerical Results
resource.description: This data set is comprised of the 2012 to 2018 Community Survey results sent out by Internal Audit.  The survey responses are mostly text responses, i.e. Very Bad to Very Good, Very Satisfied to Very Dissatisfied.  These responses have been converted in this file to be numerical numbers from 1 to 5 in order to assist in creation of more numerically informational visualizaitons

resource.name: PILOT Agreements
resource.description: PILOT Agreements through the City of Chattanooga and Hamilton County.
columns_name: Total Payments In Lieu of Taxes
Hamilton County General Tax Without PILOT Agreement
Hamilton County School Tax Without PILOT Agreement
City Payments Billed in Lieu of Taxes
Hamilton County Payments Billed in Lieu of Taxes
Hamilton County School Payments Billed in Lieu of Taxes
columns_description:
City of Chattanooga taxes that would have been required if the PILOT was not present. 

Based on the millage rate of $2.309 dollars per $100 of assessed value.
Company total payments in lieu of taxes based on the PILOT agreement.
Incentive received as part of the PILOT agreement. This value is the difference of the taxes that would have been paid without the PILOT and the payments in lieu of taxes received from the company.
Incentive received as part of the PILOT agreement. This value is the difference of the taxes that would have been paid without the PILOT and the payments in lieu of taxes received from the company.

Hamilton County General taxes that would have been required if the PILOT was not present. 


Based on the General Tax portion of  Hamilton County millage rate of $2.7652 dollars per $100 of assessed value for the

Hamilton County School taxes that would have been required if the PILOT was not present. 

Based on the School Tax portion of  Hamilton County millage rate of $2.7652 dollars per $100 of assessed value for the
Company payments to City of Chattanooga  in lieu of taxes based on the PILOT agreement.
Incentive received as part of the PILOT agreement. This value is the difference of the taxes that would have been paid without the PILOT and the payments in lieu of taxes received from the company.
Total taxes that would have been required if the PILOT was not present.
Company payments to Hamilton County Schools  in lieu of taxes based on the PILOT agreement.
A fee sometimes included as part of PILOT agreements.
Incentive received as part of the PILOT agreement. This value is the difference of the taxes that would have been paid without the PILOT and the payments in lieu of taxes received from the company.

resource.name: Combined Community Survey Raw Results
resource.description: The data is the combined raw data of the Community Survey results from 2012 to 2018.  Important to note the 2012 survey is missing questions regarding the Tivoli and Memorial Auditorium as these questions were added in the 2013 survey and continue to persist.

resource.name: NoogaNet Locations
columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Census Tracts' (wp8v-7sj9) the point in column 'location' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhood Associations' (pwng-4mvk) the point in column 'location' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Zip Codes' (p3ri-5gm3) the point in column 'location' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhood Associations_data' (fri7-gnnk) the point in column 'location' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Council_data' (9h6x-8jgn) the point in column 'location' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Council Districts' (4vzv-2fju) the point in column 'location' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Council_data' (ap6c-9ws7) the point in column 'location' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
Name of the Location for the free NoogaNet wifi spot.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'CPD Districts' (ve3d-9xnd) the point in column 'location' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.description: Provided by the Chattanooga Chamber of Commerce. This directory, last updated in 2014, provides a listing of locations providing the Greater Chattanooga area with workforce development services.
